_description: Example configurations for Phase 2 instruments: APS7050, N5182A, Analog Discovery 2, FTM_On

APS7050_1.name: GW Instek APS7050 AC/DC Power Source
APS7050_1.description: AC/DC power with built-in DMM and relay control

N5182A_1.name: Agilent N5182A MXG Signal Generator
N5182A_1.description: RF signal generator with CW and ARB modes

AD2_1.name: Digilent Analog Discovery 2
AD2_1.description: USB oscilloscope and function generator (requires WaveForms SDK)

FTM_1.name: WiFi FTM Test Interface
FTM_1.description: WiFi RF testing via ADB (requires Android device with Qualcomm chipset)

_notes: APS7050: Use channel 101-120 for output, 21-22 for current measurement
N5182A: GPIB address 16 is default, adjust as needed
FTM_On: Requires ADB in PATH and connected Android device
